articles.title: Dozens killed as Israel bombs Gaza makeshift tents, school housing families
articles.description: Dozens of people have been killed in Gaza as Israel bombs makeshift tents and a school housing families [1].

articles.title: Trump announces new tariffs on 14 countries and warns them via letters to not retaliate
articles.description: Donald Trump has announced new tariffs on 14 countries and has warned them via letters not to retaliate [3].

articles.title: Lion owners arrested after an attack on woman and her 2 children in Pakistan
articles.description: Lion owners have been arrested after an attack on a woman and her two children in Pakistan [2, 3].
